summary: This bill, H.R. 5091, amends U.S. Code to provide hazard pay to firefighters and smokejumpers involved in prescribed burns. It establishes that duties involving the ignition, control, or suppression of prescribed burns and parachute jumps by smokejumpers are duties involving unusual physical hardship or hazard, entitling them to hazard pay equivalent to that of fireline firefighters. The Director of the Office of Personnel Management must issue regulations within 90 days of enactment. The bill also specifies the definition of 'prescribed burn'.
